title: (4332) Brand New House for Sale, at Piliyandala Kesbawa,
details: Brand New House for Sale, at Piliyandala Kesbawa, The House is Completely Tiled With 4 Bed Rooms, 3 Bath Room With A/B Living Room, Dining Room, Pantry, Hot water, Car Porch & a Beautifully Designed House, Surrounded by walls. 1Km m to Piliyandala Colombo Main Road, Immediately Available for Sale at Rs 148 (Negotiable) 14.8 Million
